columnDefinition.description: Foreign key referencing directory that the virtual directory points at

columnDefinition.name: DirProperties_
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key referencing possible security information for the virtual directory

columnDefinition.name: Application_
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key referencing possible ASP application for the virtual directory

columnDefinition.name: Log
columnDefinition.description: Primary key, non-localized token

columnDefinition.name: Format
columnDefinition.description: Type of log format

columnDefinition.name: String
columnDefinition.description: Id for the SqlString

columnDefinition.name: SqlDb_
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key, SQL Server key

columnDefinition.name: Component_
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key, Component used to determine install state

columnDefinition.name: SQL
columnDefinition.description: SQL query to execute

columnDefinition.name: User_
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key, User used to log into database

columnDefinition.name: Attributes
columnDefinition.description: 1 == execute on install, 2 == execute on uninstall, 4 == continue on error, 8 == rollback on install, 16 == rollback on uninstall

columnDefinition.name: Sequence
columnDefinition.description: Order to execute SQL Queries in

columnDefinition.name: Script
columnDefinition.description: Primary key, non-localized token

columnDefinition.name: SqlDb_
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key, SQL Server key

columnDefinition.name: Component_
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key, Component used to determine install state

columnDefinition.name: ScriptBinary_
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key, Binary stream that contains SQL Script to execute

columnDefinition.name: User_
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key, User used to log into database

columnDefinition.name: Attributes
columnDefinition.description: 1 == execute on install, 2 == execute on uninstall, 4 == continue on error, 8 == rollback on install, 16 == rollback on uninstall

columnDefinition.name: Sequence
columnDefinition.description: Order to execute SQL Queries in

columnDefinition.name: SqlDb
columnDefinition.description: Primary key, non-localized token

columnDefinition.name: Server
columnDefinition.description: Primary key, name of server running SQL Server

columnDefinition.name: Instance
columnDefinition.description: Primary key, name of SQL Server instance

columnDefinition.name: Database
columnDefinition.description: Primary key, name of database in a SQL Server

columnDefinition.name: Component_
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key, Component used to determine install state

columnDefinition.name: User_
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key, User used to log into database

columnDefinition.name: Attributes
columnDefinition.description: 1 == create on install, 2 == drop on uninstall, 4 == continue on error, 8 == drop on install, 16 == create on uninstall, 32 == confirm update existing table, 64 == create on reinstall

columnDefinition.name: FileSpec
columnDefinition.description: Primary key, non-localized token

columnDefinition.name: Name
columnDefinition.description: Logical name of filespec

columnDefinition.name: Filename
columnDefinition.description: Filename to use (path must exist)

columnDefinition.name: Size
columnDefinition.description: Initial size for file

columnDefinition.name: MaxSize
columnDefinition.description: Maximum size for file

columnDefinition.name: GrowthSize
columnDefinition.description: Size file should grow when necessary

columnDefinition.name: ServiceName
columnDefinition.description: Primary key, non-localized token

columnDefinition.name: Component_
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key, Component used to determine install state

columnDefinition.name: NewService
columnDefinition.description: Whether the affected service is being installed or already exists.

columnDefinition.name: FirstFailureActionType
columnDefinition.description: First failure action type for configured service to take.

columnDefinition.name: SecondFailureActionType
columnDefinition.description: Second failure action type for configured service to take.

columnDefinition.name: ThirdFailureActionType
columnDefinition.description: Third failure action type for configured service to take.

columnDefinition.name: ResetPeriodInDays
columnDefinition.description: Period after which to reset the failure count for the service.

columnDefinition.name: RestartServiceDelayInSeconds
columnDefinition.description: Period after which to restart the service after a given failure.

columnDefinition.name: ProgramCommandLine
columnDefinition.description: Command line for program to run if failure action is RUN_COMMAND.

columnDefinition.name: RebootMessage
columnDefinition.description: Message to show to users when rebooting if failure action is REBOOT.

columnDefinition.name: Name
columnDefinition.description: Primary key, non-localized token

columnDefinition.name: Value
columnDefinition.description: Value of the property

columnDefinition.name: Family
columnDefinition.description: Primary key

columnDefinition.name: Upgraded
columnDefinition.description: Primary key

columnDefinition.name: Family
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key, Family to which this image belongs

columnDefinition.name: Upgraded
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key, Upgraded image

columnDefinition.name: FTK
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key, File to ignore

columnDefinition.name: Upgraded
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key, Upgraded image

columnDefinition.name: FTK
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key, File to ignore

columnDefinition.name: Upgraded
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key, Upgraded image

columnDefinition.name: Target
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key, Target image

columnDefinition.name: FTK
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key, File to ignore

columnDefinition.name: Family
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key, Family

columnDefinition.name: FTK
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key, File to ignore

columnDefinition.name: Family
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key, Family

columnDefinition.name: FTK
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key, File to ignore

columnDefinition.name: Component
columnDefinition.description: Name of the component that represents the driver package

columnDefinition.name: Flags
columnDefinition.description: Flags for installing and uninstalling driver packages

columnDefinition.name: Sequence
columnDefinition.description: Order in which the driver packages are processed
